duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise the nursing department and oversee all nursing duties and responsibilities.
Coordinate orientation and training of nursing staff and new employees.
Organize medication administration training and psychiatric services coordination.
Liaise with healthcare facilities, pharmacies, and laboratories.
Develop and update healthcare policies, protocols, and procedures.
Complete staff evaluations and disciplinary actions when necessary.
Scheduling and oversight of after-hours nursing on-call system.
Attend departmental and agency meetings, student-related meetings, and case reviews.
Provide paid 10-day New Employee Orientation and training in Crisis Prevention Intervention, Trauma-Informed Care, and program-specific training.
Opportunity for providing paid CEUs, ongoing professional trainings, and enhanced student loan repayment.
Communicate procedures for handling insurance and provider information.

education_certification.credential: Valid Driver's License & Good Driving Record
